header_text: You meet an attractive new coworker during a meeting. After work, they request to follow you on social media. Before you let them follow you, you look over your own feed and feel confident.

elements.Text: Are you worried about what the other person thinks of your feed?

elements.name: You meet an attractive new coworker during a meeting. After work, they request to follow you on social media. Before you let them follow you, you look over your own feed and feel confident._Social Situations_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
